item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

ok i want to add a emote before a player dies what do i need to add to here for that to happen?

}

public boolean ApplyDeadz() {
if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
actionTimer = 0;
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
setAnimation(0x900);
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
IsDeadTimer = true;
ApplyDead();
}

Read full topic
